Strings.Text: {scroll 2}It's a switch for the\nfireproof shutter.{clear 0}There is no power\nconnected. It won't move.
{scroll 2}It's a switch for the\nfireproof shutter.{clear 0}Will you turn it on?\n{branch 0}
{scroll 2}There's no power going to\nthe switchboard.{clear 0}Will you turn on the\npower?{branch 0}
